name: Magma Staked Monad
description: Magma is a DAO-owned Liquid Staking platform for Monad. gMONAD is a derivative of MONAD that is staked on Magma, allowing users to stake their MONAD tokens and retain their liquidity. gMONAD holders will be able to tap into the liquidity of their MONAD tokens, and use gMONAD for DeFi activities on Monad. gMONAD can be used as collateral across dAPPS within the Monad ecosystem to buy, sell, trade, lend and borrow.
